title: HTML & CSS
description: Learn the basics of web design with HTML & CSS. Create stunning, responsive websites from scratch!

title: JavaScript for Beginners
description: Dive into JavaScript programming and master interactive web elements and functionality.

title: Advanced Python
description: Master Python and its frameworks for web development, automation, and data analysis.

title: Web Design Principles
description: Learn how to design responsive websites that look great on all devices.

title: React.js for Beginners
description: Start building interactive UIs with React and learn the fundamentals of modern web development.

title: Node.js and Express
description: Learn backend development using Node.js and build server-side applications with Express.

title: PHP for Web Development
description: Understand PHP and how to use it for building dynamic websites and web applications.

title: SQL and Databases
description: Learn how to interact with databases using SQL and build efficient database-driven websites.

title: Mobile Web Development
description: Explore best practices for developing mobile-friendly websites that work on any device.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the essentials of user interface and user experience design for creating user-friendly websites.

title: CSS Flexbox and Grid
description: Master modern CSS layout techniques including Flexbox and CSS Grid to create complex layouts.

title: JavaScript for Web Development
description: Get hands-on with JavaScript and use it to add dynamic functionality to your websites.

title: Web Security Basics
description: Learn how to secure your web applications and protect against common vulnerabilities.

title: Git and Version Control
description: Learn the basics of Git, version control, and collaboration using GitHub.

title: Agile Web Development
description: Understand Agile principles and how to apply them to modern web development workflows.
